subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms}}
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-njam}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|ཉམ}}, {{m|bo|ཉམས||soul, mind, heart}}, {{m|bo|སྙམ||to think, to feel}} ({{zh-ref|Quan, 1996}}). Related to {{och-l|恁|to think, to miss}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[miss]]; to [[long]] for; to [[think]] of; to [[recall]]
# to [[consider]]; to [[contemplate]]
# {{zh-alt-form|廿|[[twenty]]}}
# to [[worry]]; to be [[anxious]] about
# to [[feel]] [[compassion]] for; to [[pity]]
# to [[show]] [[tender]] [[affection]] for
# to [[commemorate]]; to [[memorialise]]; to [[pay]] [[tribute]] to
# [[idea]]; [[thought]]
# {{lb|zh|Buddhism}} [[memory]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
